pages.text: 69|9|haey hvie r aon  ning anak del pimoun ke  ning krom lout sotth  te ban br pru td babakamm .
69|10|haey puokke themtang ban brachheang nung anakneasar nei mcheasa  robsa puokke tiet phng .  dau che  neah  trong ban thveutearounakamm puokke nouv  tearounakamm muoy da thngonthngor .
69|11|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban doek puok anak now leu saampow now  pel del tukchomnn laeng huosa kamrit .
69|12|daembi yeung touk vea  samreab puok anak thveuchea merien muoy ning  trachiek del ban sdablyy yk chetd toukdeak champoh vea .
69|13|haey nowpel del tre trauv ban ke phlom leuktimuoy .
69|14|haey phendei  ning phnom trauv ban ke leuk chenh( pi tikanleng robsa  vea)  ruoch vea teangpir ka bek khe  t ch khtei temdong .
69|15|thngai noh haey kuchea thngai barlok ban kaetlaeng .
69|16|haey mekh kaban bek khe  t ch khtei  haey now thngai noh vea klay  tow chea tn .
69|17|haey mea la ai kat del now krob chroung nei mekh . haey  now thngai noh mean mea la ai kat brabei roub tr a r sh nei mcheasa robsa anak  now pi leu puokke .
69|18|now thngai noh puok anak nung trauv ke neamk bangheanh( now champoh  moukh a l laoh)  daoy kmean pheap athrkambang namuoy robsa puok anak  ach leakbang ban laey .

69|19|rie anaknea haey del trauv ban ke brakl sievphowkamnt  heto robsa ke now daisdam robsa ke noh  ke nung niyeay( towkeanknea  robsa ke) tha  chaur puok anak yk sievphow kamntheto robsakhnhom tow  an choh .
69|20|pitabrakd nasa  khnhom chuecheak yeang chbasa tha  khnhom pitchea nung  ttuol ban phalbony robsakhnhom dauchnih .
69|21|haey ke nung rsanow daoy kdei keab chetd cheatibamphot
69|22|nowknong thansuokr da khpangkhpasa .
69|23|phlechheu krob braphet now chit ke bamphot .
69|24|chaur puok anak briphok  ning phoek daoy rikreay daoysaarte  avei del puok anak thleab ban sang kanlongomk nowknong lokey choh .

69|25|rie anaknea haey delke ban brakl nouv sievphowkamnt  heto robsa ke now dai che  v ng robsa ke  ke nung niyeay tha  ao anichchea khluonokhnhom  aey.  sangkhumtha khnhom min trauv ke brakl sievphow kamntheto robsakhnhom  nih laey .
69|26|haey khnhom ka mintean doeng der tha  avei tow chea lotthophl robsakhnhom  noh .
69|27|ao anichchea.  sangkhumtha sechakdeislab( robsakhnhom ko  n ng lokey)  ban b pea  ch b avei  teangoasa .
69|28|tropy sa mb tde robsakhnhom kmean brayoch avei dl khnhom laey .
69|29|amnach robsakhnhom kaban batbng pi khnhom der .
69|30|( mean ke niyeay towkean anakyeam tvear nork tha)  chaur anak  chab chn nih  ruoch dak chravak(k  ning daicheung) ke .
69|31|banteabmk  baoh ke chaul knong phleung nork choh .
69|32|banteabmk  chaur puok anak daot ke nung chravak del mean braveng  robsa vea chetseb hatth choh .
69|33|pitabrakd nasa  ke minothleab mean chomnue leu a l laoh  da mha thomtheng laey .
69|34|haey ke min del chomrounh knea leu kar phdal chamneiahar dl  anak kreikr laey .
